issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for writing results to Parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10645](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10645). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ExecutionContext current supports writing results to CSV but not Parquet. We should add Parquet writes now that we have the ArrowWriter for Parquet.

We should also look at adding write commands to the DataFrame API and logical plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10645?focusedCommentId=17240030) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
The Parquet writer should be usable for most primitive types, and with the CSV writer; we should be able to get some decent write support.

I've thought of a JSON writer before, but it's of little interest to me.
